thoughts.text: I think I should use the 'list_files' command to see if the file I want to delete exists on my system.
thoughts.reasoning: Before deleting a file, it is important to ensure that the file actually exists on the system. By using the 'list_files' command, I can see a list of files in a directory and check if the file I want to delete is present. This will help me avoid accidentally deleting the wrong file.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'list_files' command to see if the file I want to delete exists on my system.
thoughts.criticism: I need to remember to specify the correct directory when using the 'list_files' command, otherwise I may not see the file I am looking for. I should also be careful when deleting files and ensure that I only delete files that I am sure I no longer need.
thoughts.speak: I think I should use the 'list_files' command to see if the file I want to delete exists on my system.
